title: 🦞 "Don't punish people for admitting they were wrong, you make it harder for them to improve." - Ideopunk
content:
Given an integer n, return true if it's a perfect square AND when reversed, is still a perfect square.

Example:

> reversedSquares(9)
> true

> reversedSquares(441)
> true

> reversedSquares(25)
> false
